testcase.name: Verify cart updates after adding items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after adding items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.415s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.220s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify cart updates after removing items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify cart updates after removing items Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.981s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.058s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.212s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.199s And User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.188s Then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.978s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.059s When User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.227s And User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.215s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.209s Then User verify the items in cart ... passed in 0.006s When User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.190s Then User should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
